Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of San Diego
Private Litigation Case Title: Michael King vs West Marine Products Inc
Taylor et al v. West Marine Products, Inc.

Description: West Marine Products, Inc. agreed to pay $389,748 in settlement of allegations by the Santa Clara and Santa Cruz County District Attorneys that it did not correctly charge the lowest price advertised or posted for products in its stores at the checkout registers.
